descriptionHtml:
These plugins allows Wet and Cold to distribute Frostfall's backpacks instead of Wet and Colds backpacks.

[color=#ff0000]Installation:[/color]
    Select ONLY a single plugin and place it in the Skyrim/Data folder, activate plugin.

[color=#ff0000]Uninstallation:[/color]
    Remove all plugins from the Skyrim/Data folder.

[color=#ff0000]WHICH PLUGIN TO CHOOSE?[/color] Remember choose only one plugin.

[color=#ff7700]Frostfall - WetandCold Backpack Swap[/color]: Allows just the three basic types of Frostfall's backpacks to be distributed by Wet and Cold.

[color=#ff7700]Frostfall - WetandCold Backpack Swap[/color] [color=#ff7700](By The Nine)[/color]: Allows all of the basic and holy symbol backpacks to be distributed by Wet and Cold.

[color=#ff7700]Frostfall - WetandCold Backpack Swap (By The Eight):[/color] Allows all of the basic backpacks and all of the holy symbol backpacks, except Talos
                                                                                 to be distributed by Wet and Cold.

[color=#ffff00]Credits:[/color]
Isoku and Chesko for making very enjoyable mods that has brought all of us many hours of enjoyment. Thanks.
author: Furyfish
